# Selected CR30-Users modifcations to `v2.0.9.3`

These patches carry the recommended changes ✅ from [pull/1](https://github.com/wireddown/GCode-Machine-Configurations/pull/1). The reverted modifications are in this [patch set](./002a-Revert-some-CR30-Users-changes.patch.md).

## Cover

```
From 6fdb7e2e6f7930d6883526c6558b1f8130ac1b2c Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
From: Down to the Wire <8404598+wireddown@users.noreply.github.com>
Date: Thu, 8 Jun 2023 19:40:58 -0700
Subject: Selected CR30-Users modifcations to v2.0.9.3

See https://github.com/wireddown/GCode-Machine-Configurations/pull/1 for discussion and details.

---
 Marlin/Configuration.h                        |   22 +-
 Marlin/Configuration_adv.h                    |   28 +-
 Marlin/_Bootscreen.h                          | 1648 ++++++++++-------
 Marlin/_Statusscreen.h                        |   65 +-

 Marlin/src/lcd/menu/menu_motion.cpp           |    5 +-
 Marlin/src/pins/stm32f1/pins_CREALITY_V4210.h |    4 +-
 7 files changed, 1071 insertions(+), 786 deletions(-)
```
